customer

Class Customer

  • java.lang.Object
    • customer.Customer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CustomerView

    public class Customer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A class to holds customer's data

    • Constructor Detail

      • Customer

        public Customer(long ID,
                long storeID,
                java.lang.String name,
                java.lang.String phoneNumber,
                Customer.PayType payMethod,
                float accountBalance,
                java.lang.String creditCardNumber,
                boolean accountStatus,
                java.util.Calendar expirationDate)
         throws Customer.CustomerException
        Creates a new Customer with the following parameters
        Parameters:
        ID - the customer ID
        storeID - the store that the customer belongs to
        name - the customer name
        phoneNumber - the customer phone-number
        payMethod - credit card or by subscription
        accountBalance - the customer account balance
        creditCardNumber - the customer credit card number
        accountStatus - the customer account status
        expirationDate - the subscription expiration date
        Throws:
        Customer.CustomerException - when invalid parameters are given
